text: @NikkiHaley In the USA 🇺🇸 on Trump’s watch, #COVID19 deaths went from 0 to 139,143. This is why it’s dangerous to close the White House pandemic office before an expected 100 year pandemic would strike again. https://t.co/qj6J4tml56
